actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to treat certain service by Federal employees in international organizations as leave without pay.

summary.text: Treats certain service by Federal employees in international organizations as leave without pay for a period not to exceed 6 years. Applies such treatment to an annuity accruing after enactment of this Act. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8332)

titles.title: A bill to treat certain service by Federal employees in international organizations as leave without pay.
